vlive.korean: [감이 없는 편] 나는 감이 왜 이렇게 없지? [Having no sense] I guess I don't have a good sense. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉카소를 찾아라” ① (힙합팀 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: [Having no sense] I guess I don't have a good sense.

vlive.korean: 연준이 형 감이 안 잡히는데 - 제가요? I can't guess what YEONJUN's is. - Mine? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.21
vlive.english: I can't guess what YEONJUN's is. - Mine?

vlive.korean: 그래서 이게 감으로 해야 해 - 나 이거 할래, 그럼 - 감? And follow your feelings. - I'll do this one. - Feelings? 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : [Replay] BLACKPINK ‘How You Like That’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: And follow your feelings. - I'll do this one. - Feelings?

vlive.korean: 저도 아무것도 없어서 솔직히 감이 안 잡혀요 - 뭐 하지? I can't guess because there's nothing in the studio. - What should we do? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.22
vlive.english: I can't guess because there's nothing in the studio. - What should we do?

vlive.korean: 감 잡았어 감 잡았어! I got it! I got it! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺하이요~~
vlive.english: I got it! I got it!

examples.korean: a barrel bound with iron hoops 발음듣기 쇠테를 감은 둥근 통 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a barrel bound with iron hoops 발음

examples.korean: My hair snaggles when I wash it. 발음듣기 내 머리는 감을 때 뒤엉킨다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My hair snaggles when I wash it. 발음

examples.korean: I had some idea of what the job would be like. 발음듣기 나는 그 일이 어떤 것일지 약간 감이 잡혔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I had some idea of what the job would be like. 발음

examples.korean: I have tried to convey something of the flavour of the argument. 발음듣기 나는 그 논쟁에 대해 어떤 감을 전달하려고 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I have tried to convey something of the flavour of the argument. 발음

examples.korean: The brochure should give you a good idea of the hotel. 발음듣기 이 책자를 보시면 그 호텔에 대해 감이 잡히실 겁니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The brochure should give you a good idea of the hotel. 발음
